name: Block Craft World 3D
description:
Block Craft World - new bulding and crafting simulator. Build houses, craft block & resources, exploration endless biomes, fight mobs and monsters, do farming, fishing, hunting. Build big cities with skyscrapers and villages in Creative mode and complete quests in Story mode. Create a unique transport, fly on airplanes and swim on the ships! Take care of pets, make friends and much more awaits you inside the game!
___________________________________________________________________

This app use code from the Minetest project
you can always get the newest Minetest code from https://github.com/minetest/minetest
